/icons/devops/00012-icon-service-Applica.name: Application Insights
/icons/devops/00012-icon-service-Applica.description: Monitors and analyzes application performance, usage, and exceptions to identify issues and improve user experience.

/icons/devops/00563-icon-service-Change-.name: Change Analysis
/icons/devops/00563-icon-service-Change-.description: Analyzes changes to Azure resources, identifying potential issues and providing recommendations for improvement.

/icons/devops/02373-icon-service-CloudTe.name: CloudTest
/icons/devops/02373-icon-service-CloudTe.description: A fully managed service for automating testing of cloud-native applications, APIs, and services.

/icons/devops/02423-icon-service-Load-Te.name: Load Testing
/icons/devops/02423-icon-service-Load-Te.description: Simulate and analyze load on web applications, APIs, and microservices to ensure scalability and performance

/icons/devops/02761-icon-service-Lab-Acc.name: Lab Accounts
/icons/devops/02761-icon-service-Lab-Acc.description: Manage and deliver cloud-based labs to students, teachers, or developers for hands-on learning and testing

/icons/devops/03339-icon-service-DevOps-.name: DevOps Starter
/icons/devops/03339-icon-service-DevOps-.description: Streamlines application development by providing pre-configured, cloud-based infrastructure for building, testing, and deploying applications

/icons/devops/03393-icon-service-Managed.name: Managed DevOps Pools
/icons/devops/03393-icon-service-Managed.description: Streamline CI/CD processes by managing multiple devops pipelines in a single, scalable pool of agents

/icons/devops/03455-icon-service-Code-Op.name: Code Optimization
/icons/devops/03455-icon-service-Code-Op.description: Optimizes and improves the performance of .NET code running in Azure, including applications written using ASP.NET, WPF, and Windows Forms

/icons/devops/03623-icon-service-Workspa.name: Workspace Gateway
/icons/devops/03623-icon-service-Workspa.description: Securely access on-premises data and resources from Azure-based services through a single, managed gateway

/icons/devops/10042-icon-service-API-Man.name: API Management Services
/icons/devops/10042-icon-service-API-Man.description: API Management provides a cloud-based platform to design, implement, and manage APIs across multiple protocols and platforms.

/icons/devops/10048-icon-service-API-Con.name: API Connections
/icons/devops/10048-icon-service-API-Con.description: API Connections enables secure, managed connections to external APIs and services for Azure applications.
